The call for a bounty on Trump is not ye: or represent the official position of, Iranian authorities.
News editor M: Hanif Jazayeri posted a tweet stating that Iran had placed an $80 million bounty on the head of U.S. President Donald Trump in retaliation for a U.S. airstrike in Baghdad that killed Iranian Major General Qassem Soleimani.
The EN24 website reported that the offer: and the amount of the bounty was based on Iran's population.
